originalText.text:
Vlad is THE jack of all trades professional handyman.

I moved into a new apartment, and there were a lot of miscellaneous repairs and updates that I wanted to take care of. Over a few weeks, Vlad diligently ticked off everything on my to-do list.

1. Swapped out the ceiling fans for new light fixtures and recommended different light bulbs to improve the ambiance
2. Repaired the antique doorknobs that had fallen off
3. Removed pots and pans wall mount, stripped the wall, removed the wainscoting, and installed custom floating shelves
4. Patched holes in the wall and sanded down the existing bumps
5. Taught me how to paint my living room myself and how to clean paint if it got on appliances or the floor. He sent me Amazon links so I could purchase all the needed painting tools and supplies myself and how to clean everything to reuse them again.
6. Rewired and hung all my artwork and mirrors
7. Fixed the outlets that were not charging things
8. Increased the water pressure of my bathroom sink
9. Replaced the old kitchen faucet with a new replacement
10. Fixed a botched TV mount and reorganized all the wires so weren't a tangled ball crammed into the outlet strip.

He's a clear communicator, always on time, and reasonably priced. He's also super clean and tidy and is super careful when working inside your home.

For as long as I live in NYC, Vlad will be my go-to trusted handyman.

originalText.text: Couldn’t be happier with Vlad’s service and highly recommend. Very professional guy, responsive, and knows his stuff. Glad to have found him on here and will definitely hire him back in the future.

text.text: Couldn’t be happier with Vlad’s service and highly recommend. Very professional guy, responsive, and knows his stuff. Glad to have found him on here and will definitely hire him back in the future.

originalText.text: I hired Vlad last year to fix a problem with my old Toto toilet... he was courteous, respectful, punctual, quoted me a fair price, and fixed the problem in about 10 minutes.

text.text: I hired Vlad last year to fix a problem with my old Toto toilet... he was courteous, respectful, punctual, quoted me a fair price, and fixed the problem in about 10 minutes.

originalText.text: Vlad is a consummate professional, and I highly recommend him to anyone seeking a handyperson. I needed some repairs for one of my rentals; Vlad did an outstanding job repairing previous water damage on one of my walls, regrouted and caulked the bathroom and repainted the living room. During the project, I decided to remove my kitchenette. Vlad found me a subcontractor and ensured the replacement was done before my new tenant moved into the unit. If you need anything fixed in NYC, Vlad can fix it.

originalText.text: Vlad was introduced to us by someone who had used him and stated that he was a competent and honest guy.  After using him , we agree 100%.  We have an apartment in Manhattan.  Vlad fixed our kitchen faucet which was clogged with rubber that had broken off from the valve.  He also replaced some door knobs, hung two heavy mirrors and repaired a toilet tank float.  We are glad we met Vlad.
